Class OrderQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.sqlHandlers.OrderQueries

extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the queries which are related to orders

      • findMatchingOrdersInWaitingList

        public java.util.ArrayList<logic.Order> findMatchingOrdersInWaitingList(java.util.ArrayList<?> parameters)
        This function return orders in waiting list that can replace the can canceled order.
        Parameters:
        parameters - ArrayList containing: parkId,maxVisitors in the park, estimatedStayTime in the park, date of the canceled order, timeToCheck of the canceled order, gap between max and current in the park
        Returns:
        ArrayList of object Order containing matching orders.
